public class AdminView extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
The AdminView class provides an admin dashboard for managing events, organizers, users, and facilities. Admins can view lists of these entities, navigate to their detailed views, and perform administrative actions. The class fetches data from Firebase Firestore and displays it in expandable dropdown menus.

      Parameters:

    • addTextViewToDropdown

      private void addTextViewToDropdown(android.widget.LinearLayout dropdown, String text, android.view.View.OnClickListener clickListener)
      Adds a TextView to the specified dropdown layout with the given text and click listener. The TextView is styled with a background, padding, and a drawable arrow icon.
      Parameters:
      dropdown - The LinearLayout to which the TextView will be added.
      text - The text to display in the TextView.
      clickListener - The click listener to attach to the TextView.

    • setonClickListeners

      private void setonClickListeners()
      Sets onClick listeners for UI components including back button, dropdown toggles, and navigation icons. Defines actions for navigating to other screens or toggling dropdowns.

    • initialise

      private void initialise()
      Initializes all UI components, sets typefaces and drawable resources, and initializes the Firestore instance.

    • toggleDropdown

      private void toggleDropdown(android.widget.LinearLayout dropdownLayout, android.widget.TextView dropdownButton)
      Toggles the visibility of the specified dropdown layout and updates the dropdown button icon accordingly. Expands the dropdown if it is hidden, or collapses it if it is visible.
      Parameters:
      dropdownLayout - The LinearLayout representing the dropdown menu.
      dropdownButton - The TextView button associated with the dropdown menu.
